column2:
"You're pretty tough, killer...
But even you worry about havin' to beat 70 Super Hard enemies, right?"
"Even if you're not, like, SCARED scared, you gotta be a little nervous, yeah?"
"But you still took my request without even thinkin' about it. "
"I guess it makes sense the big bosses keep makin' me repeat my training, if they're comparin' me to you..."
